surgery.description: Whether the horse had surgery or not

value_dict.no: The horse did not have surgery

rectal_temp.description: The horse's rectal temperature in degrees Celsius

pulse.description: The horse's pulse rate per minute

respiratory_rate.description: The horse's respiratory rate per minute

temp_of_extremities.description: The temperature of the horse's extremities

value_dict.normal: The horse's extremities are at a normal temperature

peripheral_pulse.description: The quality of the horse's peripheral pulse

value_dict.reduced: The horse's peripheral pulse is reduced
value_dict.normal: The horse's peripheral pulse is normal
value_dict.absent: The horse's peripheral pulse is absent
value_dict.increased: The horse's peripheral pulse is increased

mucous_membrane.description: The appearance of the horse's mucous membranes

value_dict.pale_cyanotic: The horse's mucous membranes are pale cyanotic
value_dict.pale_pink: The horse's mucous membranes are pale pink
value_dict.dark_cyanotic: The horse's mucous membranes are dark cyanotic
value_dict.normal_pink: The horse's mucous membranes are normal pink
value_dict.bright_red: The horse's mucous membranes are bright red
value_dict.bright_pink: The horse's mucous membranes are bright pink

capillary_refill_time.description: The horse's capillary refill time in seconds

value_dict.more_3_sec: The horse's capillary refill time is more than 3 seconds
value_dict.less_3_sec: The horse's capillary refill time is less than 3 seconds
value_dict.3: The horse's capillary refill time is exactly 3 seconds

pain.description: The level of pain the horse is experiencing

value_dict.extreme_pain: The horse is in extreme pain
value_dict.mild_pain: The horse is in mild pain
value_dict.severe_pain: The horse is in severe pain

abdominal_distention.description: The level of distention in the horse's abdomen

value_dict.severe: The horse has severe abdominal distention
value_dict.slight: The horse has slight abdominal distention
value_dict.none: The horse has no abdominal distention
value_dict.moderate: The horse has moderate abdominal distention

nasogastric_tube.description: The status of the horse's nasogastric tube

value_dict.none: The horse has no nasogastric tube
value_dict.slight: The horse has a slight nasogastric tube
value_dict.significant: The horse has a significant nasogastric tube

nasogastric_reflux.description: The amount of reflux from the horse's nasogastric tube

value_dict.less_1_liter: The horse has less than 1 liter of nasogastric reflux
value_dict.none: The horse has no nasogastric reflux
value_dict.more_1_liter: The horse has more than 1 liter of nasogastric reflux

nasogastric_reflux_ph.description: The pH of the horse's nasogastric reflux

rectal_exam_feces.description: The results of the horse's rectal exam

value_dict.decreased: The horse has decreased feces from the rectal exam
value_dict.absent: The horse has no feces from the rectal exam
value_dict.normal: The horse has a normal amount of feces from the rectal exam
value_dict.increased: The horse has increased feces from the rectal exam

abdomen.description: The condition of the horse's abdomen

value_dict.distend_large: The horse's abdomen is largely distended
value_dict.other: The horse's abdomen is in another condition
value_dict.distend_small: The horse's abdomen is slightly distended

total_protein.description: The total protein level in the horse's blood

abdomo_appearance.description: The appearance of the horse's abdominal fluid

value_dict.cloudy: The horse's abdominal fluid is cloudy
value_dict.serosanguious: The horse's abdominal fluid is serosanguious
value_dict.clear: The horse's abdominal fluid is clear

abdomo_protein.description: The protein level in the horse's abdominal fluid

surgical_lesion.description: Whether the horse has a surgical lesion or not

value_dict.no: The horse has no surgical lesion
value_dict.yes: The horse has a surgical lesion

lesion_1.description: The type of the first lesion

value_dict.0: The horse has no first lesion
value_dict.1400: The horse has a first lesion of type 1400
value_dict.7111: The horse has a first lesion of type 7111
value_dict.3111: The horse has a first lesion of type 3111
value_dict.6112: The horse has a first lesion of type 6112
value_dict.3112: The horse has a first lesion of type 3112

lesion_2.description: The type of the second lesion

value_dict.0: The horse has no second lesion
value_dict.1400: The horse has a second lesion of type 1400
value_dict.7111: The horse has a second lesion of type 7111
value_dict.3111: The horse has a second lesion of type 3111
value_dict.6112: The horse has a second lesion of type 6112
value_dict.3112: The horse has a second lesion of type 3112

lesion_3.description: The type of the third lesion

value_dict.0: The horse has no third lesion
value_dict.2209: The horse has a third lesion of type 2209

cp_data.description: Whether the horse was part of a clinical pathology data set or not

value_dict.no: The horse was not part of a clinical pathology data set
value_dict.yes: The horse was part of a clinical pathology data set

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting horse survival outcomes based on their medical data.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the medical features of the horse, please predict the survival outcome.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting whether a horse had surgery based on their medical data.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the medical features of the horse, please predict if the horse had surgery.

class_value_dict.no: The horse did not have surgery
